title: To be of use shift in speakers focus

content.prompt: One effect of the shift in the speaker’s focus in the third stanza is to

choices.label: introduce the idea that dedication to a task is a quality valued by most people
argue that it is better to be a follower than a leader
emphasize the value that the speaker puts on the act of collaboration
lament the speaker’s own tendency toward thought instead of action

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
